mapper.select: SELECT music_id, title, album, artist, lyrics, genre, feeling, album_path, yt_link, public_dt FROM MUSIC WHERE feeling = #{feeling}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUSIC ( music_id, title, album, artist, lyrics, genre, feeling, album_path, yt_link, public_dt ) VALUES ( #{musicId}, #{title}, #{album}, #{artist}, #{lyrics}, #{genre}, #{feeling}, #{albumPath}, #{ytLink}, #{publicDt} )
